name: AeroVeedramon
effect: [When Digivolving] If you have a blue Tamer in play, unsuspend 1 of your blue Digimon.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] When this Digimon becomes unsuspended during your main phase, it gains ＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon) for the turn.
